contents.name: welcome.txt
contents.contents: Greetings! My name is Wei Wang! Welcome to Wei's World!

contents.name: info.txt
contents.contents: I am professional Software Engineer bilingual in English and Mandarin. I am a self-starter & love to learn all cutting-edge technologies. I have the experiences with PHP7, Javascript/ES6, React/Redux, VueJs, Babel, Webpack, AWS, NoSQL, Ajax, Java, Python, Memcached, etc...You can find me on Github or my LinkedIn page. Also feel free to send me an email at wwei1987@gmail.com

contents.name: triniti.txt
contents.contents: Triniti is an open source framework build on pbj and pbjx, and pbjx is a messging tool which inspired by Google's Protocol Buffers.

contents.name: triniti/app-js
contents.description: Lightweight container for redux + pbjx app.

contents.name: triniti/admin-ui-plugin-js
contents.description: Admin UI plugin for triniti apps.

contents.name: triniti/notify-php
contents.description: Php library that provides implementations for triniti:notify schemas.

contents.name: shoutrageous! CMS
contents.description: Design and code the content management system for shoutrageous! in VueJs
